title: login does not work!
body:
I get this line when I try to login: Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here If it looks good, follow the guide here
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: We've got some possible fixes over in a [**sticky thread**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/hF8EV88W-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline) I made recently. Give those steps a try, and if it doesn't work reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more in-depth troubleshooting!

fix here! look at  Will Schleicher (NA) comment. It worked for me.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/hF8EV88W-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline?comment=0000
Yup, same problem. This has started to happen every month or so and it's quite annoying @_@

Also this fix ---> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/hF8EV88W-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline

DOES NOT WORK. At least today isn't.

Network Operations – a minute ago
We're aware of a problem causing login attempts to fail, and are working on a fix.
Same here. Tried the Troubleshoot with deleting one line. But still doesnt work
RIOTTTT CANT LOG IN NEED HELP
